meta.name: description
meta.content: aaPanel is a powerful and easy-to-use web hosting control panel for linux server.one-click install LNMP/LAMP/OpenLiteSpeed developing environment and software.

div.div: Deploy aaPanel in seconds with ClawCloud VPS – from $2.10/Month! 30% Off with Code "aapanel"

div.data-i18n: Easily create aaPanel Sub-users & hosting packages

a.div: Easily create aaPanel Sub-users & hosting packages

a.div: Simple and easy setup, backup and cloning of WordPress

div.data-i18n: Grow Your Business with Powerful Email Marketing

a.div: Grow Your Business with Powerful Email Marketing

div.data-i18n: Easily manage your personal or company mail server

a.div: Easily manage your personal or company mail server

div.data-i18n: Protect your website application security with aaPanel Nginx WAF

a.div: Protect your website application security with aaPanel Nginx WAF

div.data-i18n: Keep your server data secure with aaPanel Scheduled Tasks

a.div: Keep your server data secure with aaPanel Scheduled Tasks

div.data-i18n: Protect your files and folders from malicious modification

a.div: Protect your files and folders from malicious modification

div.data-i18n: Terminals, RDP and aaPanel - All in One Hub

a.div: Terminals, RDP and aaPanel - All in One Hub

div.div:
"It's easy to operate" "Free to use forever" "Really useful" Free and Easy-to-use Hosting Control Panel

aaPanel has released 200+ versions since 2017 and has been installed on more than 3,000,000+ servers.

The free version supports managing WP Toolkit, Websites, Mail Servers, FTP, Mysql, File Management, Online code editors.

You can also upgrade to Pro that supports Accounts(Shared hosting, Multiple Users), WAF, Analysis, File Protection, Send Emails in Bulk Install aaPanel Free Edition Free for Life aaPanel Pro Start aaPanel-Pro Free 14-day trial BillionMail, An Open-Source Email Marketing Solution for Smarter Campaigns

h1.data-i18n: Simple and easy setup, backup and cloning of WordPress

div.h1: Simple and easy setup, backup and cloning of WordPress

text.data-i18n: With aaPanel's WP Toolkit, you can management theme, plugins, back up, migrate, restore, and set up security for your WordPress website with one click.

div.text: With aaPanel's WP Toolkit, you can management theme, plugins, back up, migrate, restore, and set up security for your WordPress website with one click.

text.data-i18n: Deploy your website in minutes, bind domain names, deploy SSL with one click, change website configurations, and more.

div.text: Deploy your website in minutes, bind domain names, deploy SSL with one click, change website configurations, and more.

text.data-i18n: Monitor your server resource occupancy in real time, allowing you to better understand its load capacity.

div.text: Monitor your server resource occupancy in real time, allowing you to better understand its load capacity.

text.data-i18n: A convenient and efficient file manager that supports uploading, downloading, packaging, decompression and other operations, and can write code online.

div.text: A convenient and efficient file manager that supports uploading, downloading, packaging, decompression and other operations, and can write code online.

text.data-i18n: Through the web interface, you can easily manage the server software used for installation, as well as rich extension applications.

div.text: Through the web interface, you can easily manage the server software used for installation, as well as rich extension applications.

h2.data-i18n: Server management tools that everyone can use

div.h2: Server management tools that everyone can use

p.data-i18n: Simple and friendly interactive experience, the panel can be installed in 2 minutes

div.p: Simple and friendly interactive experience, the panel can be installed in 2 minutes

p.data-i18n: One-click installation of LEMP/LAMP website environment

div.p: One-click installation of LEMP/LAMP website environment

h3.data-i18n: Become a master of server management easily

div.h3: Become a master of server management easily

p.data-i18n: aaPanel is a Free and Open source Hosting control panel, encapsulates common Linux commands into functional modules, It can be completed in a few clicks on the panel

div.p: aaPanel is a Free and Open source Hosting control panel, encapsulates common Linux commands into functional modules, It can be completed in a few clicks on the panel

p.data-i18n: One-click inspection of 16 common server security risks, firewall, whether the default port is modified, etc. and provide solutions, integrate free Fail2ban and Nginx WAF

div.p: One-click inspection of 16 common server security risks, firewall, whether the default port is modified, etc. and provide solutions, integrate free Fail2ban and Nginx WAF

p.data-i18n: Support more than 100 server management functions such as one-click LAMP/LEMP/monitoring/website/FTP/database

div.p: Support more than 100 server management functions such as one-click LAMP/LEMP/monitoring/website/FTP/database

p.data-i18n: Long-term update and maintenance more reliable

div.p: Long-term update and maintenance more reliable

p.data-i18n: aaPanel is a Free and Easy-to-use Hosting Control Panel

div.p: aaPanel is a Free and Easy-to-use Hosting Control Panel
